name: Elemental Balance (Global GameJam 2018)
description:
Elemental Balance a game for the annual Global Game Jam (2018) made in 48 hours.
Theme: Transmissions

Keep the balance in the woods. The Fire Spirit and Water Spirit have to balance their movement to keep the Ancestral Ruins in harmony. 

Fire consumes the grass, when the grass burns fertile earth emerges, and the Water help new grass born. The Fire Spirit is weak against earth and water, and Water Spirit is weak against fire and grass.  

Elemental Balance is a Co-Op game where two people have to control each Spirit trying to not consume everything (and killing the other one). Each turn one player moves trying to move where they are not weak against.If both spirits are near enought, they both take damage. Recollect elemental stones to gain points.
